attributes.action: Control/limit insurance prices as we have seen an astronomical increase.
attributes.additional_details: There is no governance of pricing within this market that is fair or just. This needs to be governed as companies are taking advantage of many individuals. The government make it a legal requirement to have insurance and therefore the pricing of this too needs to be more regulated. The prices are extortionate, friends have told me their insurance prices are £10,000 or above on car less than £1000.
attributes.background: Prices of car insurances have increased ridiculously. Simply passing the costs over to  consumers is not good enough. People are living in a cost of living crisis, we see even millionaires complaining about their children’s car insurances prices. Imagine the normal everyday person.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petitions open, which you may wish to sign:

'Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067

'Place a Cap on Motor Insurance Premium Increases'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649918
